title: Golden State President Bob Myers
description:
Golden State's Bob Myers joins The Woj Pod to discuss the restart of the NBA season, reshaping the Warriors to chase more championships, Kevin Durant and the toll the Warriors finals run took on him. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
